duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate researchers within MCIC and develop relationships with sponsors.
Manage funding and relationships with CarbonSAFE project partners.
Ensure compliance with sponsor requirements and Mines policies.
Analyze, balance, and report on the CarbonSAFE account expenditures.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree with advanced learning attained through professional experience relevant to project and financial management (Master's preferred)
